column1: alex nobue okada| mr. alex nobue okada
column5: died at the hale ho'ola hamakua on friday
column8: hi and was a retired vegetable farmer. he was also a member of the kamuela hongwanji mission and the kamuela japanese american civic association. friends may call at the kamuela hongwanji mission on saturday
column11: where a memorial service will be held at 4:00 pm. the family requests casual attire and that flowers be omitted. he is survived by his: wife
column17: hi and rockwell okada of honolulu
column21: one great grandson; numerous nieces & nephews.
